8:T438,https://defence-ua.com/army_and_war/v_ukrgidroenergo_rozpovili_jak_rashisti_tsilesprjamovano_pidirvali_kahovsku_ges_za_najgirshim_variantom-11812.html#:~:text=%D0%9F%D0%BE%D0%BF%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%B5%D1%87%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B9%20%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B7%D1%80%D1%96%D0%B7%20%D0%9A%D0%B0%D1%85%D0%BE%D0%B2%D1%81%D1%8C%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%97%20%D0%B3%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%B1%D0%BB%D1%96%3A%201%20%2D%20%D0%B2%D0%BE%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%B7%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%BD%D0%B0%20%D0%B3%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%B1%D0%BB%D1%8F%3B%202%20%2D%20%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%BA%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B9%20%D0%BF%D0%BE%D0%BD%D1%83%D1%80%3B%203%20%2D%20%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%B8%D0%B9%20%D1%88%D0%BF%D1%83%D0%BD%D1%82%3B%204%20%2D%20%D0%B2%D0%BE%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%B1%D1%96%D0%B9%3B%205%20%2D%20%D1%80%D0%B8%D1%81%D0%B1%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%BC%D0%B0%3B%206%20%2D%20%D0%B7%D1%83%D0%B1%20%D0%BD%D1%96%D0%B7%D0%B4%D1%80%D1%8E%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%BE%D1%97%20%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%BD%D1%81%D1%82%D1%80%D1%83%D0%BA%D1%86%D1%96%D1%97%20%D0%B7%20%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE%20%D1%88%D0%BF%D1%83%D0%BD%D1%82%D0%B09:T509,http://energetika.in.ua/ua/books/book-3/part-2/section-4/4-3-grebli-gidrovuzliv#:~:text=%D0%9C%D0%B0%D0%BB.%204.36.%20%D0%92%D0%BE%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%B7%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%BD%D0%B0%20%D0%B3%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%B1%D0%BB%D1%8F%20%D0%9A%D0%B0%D1%85%D0%BE%D0%B2%D1%81%D1%8C%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%97%20%D0%93%D0%95%D0%A1%20%D0%BD%D0%B0%20%D0%BC%D1%96%D0%BB%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%BF%D1%96%D1%89%D0%B0%D0%BD%D1%96%D0%B9%20%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%B2%D1%96.%20%D0%9F%D0%BE%D0%BF%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%B5%D1%87%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B9%20%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B7%D1%80%D1%96%D0%B7%3A%201%20%E2%80%93%20%D0%B2%D0%BE%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%B7%D0%BB%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%BD%D0%B0%20%D0%B3%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%B1%D0%BB%D1%8F%3B%202%20%E2%80%93%20%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%BA%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B9%20%D0%BF%D0%BE%D0%BD%D1%83%D1%80%3B%203%20%E2%80%93%20%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%B8%D0%B9%20%D1%88%D0%BF%D1%83%D0%BD%D1%82%3B%204%20%E2%80%93%20%D0%B2%D0%BE%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%B1%D1%96%D0%B9%3B%205%20%E2%80%93%20%D1%80%D0%B8%D1%81%D0%B1%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%BC%D0%B0%3B%206%20%E2%80%93%20%D0%B7%D1%83%D0%B1%20%D0%BD%D1%96%D0%B7%D0%B4%D1%80%D1%8E%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%BE%D1%97%20%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%BD%D1%81%D1%82%D1%80%D1%83%D0%BA%D1%86%D1%96%D1%97%20%D0%B7%20%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE%20%D1%88%D0%BF%D1%83%D0%BD%D1%82%D0%B03:[null,["$","html",null,{"lang":"en","children":["$","body",null,{"className":"__className_20951f","children":["$","$L5",null,{"parallelRouterKey":"children","segmentPath":["children"],"error":"$undefined","errorStyles":"$undefined","loading":"$undefined","loadingStyles":"$undefined","hasLoading":false,"template":["$","$L6",null,{}],"templateStyles":"$undefined","notFound":[["$","title",null,{"children":"404: Breach"]}]}],"\n",["$","div",null,{"className":"text-right text-sm italic font-serif text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-500","children":["$","p",null,{"children":["Assembled by ↗"}]]]}]}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"id":"preface","children":["$","a",null,{"href":"#preface","className":"no-underline","children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"float-left text-gray-300 dark:text-gray-700","style":{"marginLeft":"-2ch"},"children":" #"}],"Preface"]}]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":["On February 24th, 2022 russia occupied Kakhovka dam.",["$","br",null,{}],"\n","On June 6th, 2023 Kakhovka dam was breached."]}],"\n",["$","figure",null,{"children":[["$","img",null,{"src":"assets/image92-2237e55c.png"}],["$","figcaption",null,{"children":["$","small",null,{"className":"_subtle block my-1 text-sm text-left italic text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-100","children":["$","p",null,{"children":["Illustration author: ",[["$","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/andrew_barr","target":"_blank","rel":"noreferrer noopener","children":"Andrew Barr"}],["$","span",null,{"className":"text-xs font-sans","children":" ↗"}]],["$","br",null,{}],"\n","Source: ",[["$","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/andrew_barr/status/1668979717989335042","target":"_blank","rel":"noreferrer noopener","children":"https://twitter.com/andrew_barr/status/1668979717989335042"}],["$","span",null,{"className":"text-xs font-sans","children":" ↗"}]]]}]}]}]]}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"id":"summary","children":["$","a",null,{"href":"#summary","className":"no-underline","children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"float-left text-gray-300 dark:text-gray-700","style":{"marginLeft":"-2ch"},"children":" #"}],"Summary"]}]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":["Currently widely accepted version of dam breach is that it was blown up. In this document I want to show that currently our evidence of explosion is not sufficient enough, and that there are signs of progressing riverbed ",["$","a",null,{"href":"#what-is-that-scouring-that-you-keep-mentioning","children":"scouring"}]," & washout for at least 38 days before the breach, which could lead to dam collapse on June 6th. Mismanaging critical infrastructure can be as dangerous as putting explosives on it, and there’s good evidence that the dam was intentionally or unintentionally ill-maintained during the russian occupation."]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":"But let me step back a little first. Since late 2016 till russian occupation of the dam in Feb 2022, there was only one visible from satellites water drainage in Spring floods of 2018, which lasted for at most 18 days:"}],"\n",["$","figure",null,{"children":[["$","img",null,{"src":"assets/image9-be498fab.gif"}],["$","figcaption",null,{"children":["$","small",null,{"className":"_subtle block my-1 text-sm text-left italic text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-100","children":["$","p",null,{"children":["Source: ",[["$","a",null,{"href":"https://sentinelshare.page.link/SzuZ","target":"_blank","rel":"noreferrer noopener","children":"https://sentinelshare.page.link/SzuZ"}],["$","span",null,{"className":"text-xs font-sans","children":" ↗"}]]]}]}]}]]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":["Gate opening happened when HPP turbines didn’t spend enough water during Spring floods. Opening of the sluice gates is not a rare thing, but doesn’t happen often either. In this case gate opening was done in phases, according to existing water load on Kakhovka reservoir. It was ratified by a specialized committee, and even got to the UkrHydroEnergo news: ",["$","a",null,{"href":"#gates-opening-in-2018","children":"gates opening in 2018"}],". Note that the gates were opened in a symmetrical to each other and to the HPP layout. Meaning that right-bank and left-bank gates are opened symmetrically. First ",["$","a",null,{"href":"#10-04-2018-two-opened-hpp","children":"2 + HPP"}],", then ",["$","a",null,{"href":"#11-04-2018-4-opened-hpp","children":"2 + 2 + HPP"}],", then ",["$","a",null,{"href":"#14-april-2018-6-opened-hpp","children":"4 + 2 + HPP"}],"."]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":"Since russian occupation of the dam, there were two massive drainages through the gates:"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":[["$","strong",null,{"children":"First drainage"}]," lasted at least 45 days in May-June 2022:"]}],"\n",["$","figure",null,{"children":[["$","img",null,{"src":"assets/image10-8fef9451.gif"}],["$","figcaption",null,{"children":["$","small",null,{"className":"_subtle block my-1 text-sm text-left italic text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-100","children":["$","p",null,{"children":["Source: ",[["$","a",null,{"href":"https://sentinelshare.page.link/rxDu","target":"_blank","rel":"noreferrer noopener","children":"https://sentinelshare.page.link/rxDu"}],["$","span",null,{"className":"text-xs font-sans","children":" ↗"}]]]}]}]}]]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":"This drainage is done when what’s left of the original HPP crew is still allowed to the dam. They will be denied access around September-October."}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":[["$","strong",null,{"children":"Second drainage"}]," was a 8 months of almost continuous drainage from October till dam breach in June, last 7 months of which (235 days) is uninterrupted drainage through gates on just one side, near the HPP. On the same side, where the June 2023 breach will happen:"]}],"\n",["$","figure",null,{"children":[["$","img",null,{"src":"assets/image43-d3cb4383.gif"}],["$","figcaption",null,{"children":["$","small",null,{"className":"_subtle block my-1 text-sm text-left italic text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-100","children":["$","p",null,{"children":["Source: ",[["$","a",null,{"href":"https://sentinelshare.page.link/tt29","target":"_blank","rel":"noreferrer noopener","children":"https://sentinelshare.page.link/tt29"}],["$","span",null,{"className":"text-xs font-sans","children":" ↗"}]]]}]}]}]]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":["During this period the drainage happens only on one side of the river, near the HPP. There’s no symmetry in the opened gates. There’s no open-closed-open pattern of the gates that we often see ",["$","a",null,{"href":"#open-gates-2013","children":"during drainages"}],". Gates #1, #3, #5, #6, #7 are opened together with HPP gates for 235 days straight."]}],"\n",["$","figure",null,{"children":[["$","img",null,{"src":"assets/image119-41f287c7.png"}],["$","figcaption",null,{"children":["$","small",null,{"className":"_subtle block my-1 text-sm text-left italic text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-100","children":["$","p",null,{"children":["Source: ",["$","a",null,{"href":"#kakhovka-reservoir-water-levels-2016-2023","children":"Kakhovka reservoir water levels (2016-2023)"}]]}]}]}]]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":["This continuous uncontrolled drainage led to critical Kakhovka reservoir water levels, first to ",["$","a",null,{"href":"#24-march-2023","children":"record low"}]," in winter time (when Dnipro has less water income), and then to ",["$","a",null,{"href":"#16-april-4-may-2023-first-signs-of-overtopping","children":"record high"}]," during spring floods (when rains and melting snow bring a lot of water to Dnipro). The five constantly opened gates gave first too much and then too little water."]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":["Constant drainage and big water level difference in Spring likely lead to river bed scouring, first indication of which we see on ",["$","a",null,{"href":"#28-april-2023-part-of-the-wall-separating-hpp-dam-breaks","children":"28 April 2023 — part of the wall separating HPP & dam breaks"}],":"]}],"\n",["$","figure",null,{"children":[["$","img",null,{"src":"assets/image37-5b675341.jpg"}],["$","figcaption",null,{"children":["$","small",null,{"className":"_subtle block my-1 text-sm text-left italic text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-100","children":["$","p",null,{"children":["Source: ",[["$","a",null,{"href":"https://youtu.be/6XNV9QfHm54?t=20","target":"_blank","rel":"noreferrer noopener","children":"https://youtu.be/6XNV9QfHm54?t=20"}],["$","span",null,{"className":"text-xs font-sans","children":" ↗"}]]]}]}]}]]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":["Signs of riverbed scour continue with ",["$","a",null,{"href":"#1-2-june-2-3-june-2023-overtopping-fall-of-the-s-bridge","children":"a collapse of the s-bridge early in June"}],", 4 and 3 days before the dam breach:"]}],"\n",["$","figure",null,{"children":[["$","img",null,{"src":"assets/image21-bf032b68.gif"}],["$","figcaption",null,{"children":["$","small",null,{"className":"_subtle block my-1 text-sm text-left italic text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-100","children":["$","p",null,{"children":["Source: ",[["$","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/i/status/1665974703935180801","target":"_blank","rel":"noreferrer noopener","children":"https://twitter.com/i/status/1665974703935180801"}],["$","span",null,{"className":"text-xs font-sans","children":" ↗"}]]]}]}]}]]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":["Actually river bed scouring already happened when the dam was under construction in the 1950's: ",["$","a",null,{"href":"#k-dam-river-bed-was-already-scoured-washed-out-once-in-1950-s","children":"K-Dam river bed was already scoured once"}],". A flood occurred during the construction of the dam. This forced engineers to drain water through gates on one side of the dam, while water level downstream of the dam was 2 meters below normal. That led to river bed scouring / washout just downstream from rysberma for 9m deep. (",["$","a",null,{"href":"#blueprints","children":"rysberma"}]," is a protective riverbed layer downstream from the dam)"]}],"\n",["$","figure",null,{"children":[["$","img",null,{"src":"assets/image131-d5f83671.jpg"}],["$","figcaption",null,{"children":["$","small",null,{"className":"_subtle block my-1 text-sm text-left italic text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-100","children":["$","p",null,{"children":["Source: see ",["$","a",null,{"href":"#blueprints","children":"blueprints"}]]}]}]}]]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":["So we had riverbed scouring in the 1950's, in a similar situation, some 100+ meters downstream (disclaimer: I bet it got fixed then, I reference it only as a similar case). Then we have the separator wall collapse on ",["$","a",null,{"href":"#28-april-2023-part-of-the-wall-separating-hpp-dam-breaks","children":"28 April 2023"}],", 38 days before the breach, some 100 meters downstream from the barrage. Then we have the bridge foundations collapse on ",["$","a",null,{"href":"#1-2-june-2-3-june-2023-overtopping-fall-of-the-s-bridge","children":"1-2 and 2-3 of June 2023"}],", 4 and 3 days before the catastrophe, right at the base of the barrage."]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":["Progressing upstream river bed scouring could undermine the basis of the barrage and the HPP structures. Which could cause them to collapse under their own weight and water pressure from the reservoir, leading to the dam breach on ",["$","a",null,{"href":"#6-june-2023-breach","children":"6th of June, 2023"}],":"]}],"\n",["$","figure",null,{"children":[["$","img",null,{"src":"assets/image127-50409178.png"}],["$","figcaption",null,{"children":["$","small",null,{"className":"_subtle block my-1 text-sm text-left italic text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-100","children":["$","p",null,{"children":["Source: ",[["$","a",null,{"href":"https://t.me/grey_zone/19067","target":"_blank","rel":"noreferrer noopener","children":"https://t.me/grey_zone/19067"}],["$","span",null,{"className":"text-xs font-sans","children":" ↗"}]]]}]}]}]]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":"This evidence cannot rule out possible intentional explosive demolition of the dam by russians on 06 June 2023, or accidental explosions on the dam that would speed up dam destruction. But it seems like russian mismanagement of the dam could lead to the dam breach on its own."}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"id":"what-is-that-scouring-that-you-keep-mentioning","children":["$","a",null,{"href":"#what-is-that-scouring-that-you-keep-mentioning","className":"no-underline","children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"float-left text-gray-300 dark:text-gray-700","style":{"marginLeft":"-2ch"},"children":" #"}],"What is that scouring that you keep mentioning?"]}]}],"\n",["$","img",null,{"src":"assets/image107-0d483555.png"}],"\n",["$","blockquote",null,{"children":["\n",["$","p",null,{"children":["Hydrodynamic scour is the removal of sediment such as silt, sand and gravel from around the base of obstructions to the flow in the sea, rivers and canals. Scour, caused by fast flowing water, can carve out scour holes, compromising the integrity of a structure.",["$","br",null,{}],"\n",["$","small",null,{"className":"_subtle block my-1 text-sm text-left italic text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-100","children":["Source: ",[["$","a",null,{"href":"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hydrodynamic_scour","target":"_blank","rel":"noreferrer noopener","children":"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hydrodynamic_scour"}],["$","span",null,{"className":"text-xs font-sans","children":" ↗"}]]]}]]}],"\n"]}],"\n",["$","img",null,{"src":"assets/image79-953881d2.png"}],"\n",["$","blockquote",null,{"children":["\n",["$","p",null,{"children":["It is a notable cause of ",[["$","a",null,{"href":"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bridge_scour","target":"_blank","rel":"noreferrer noopener","children":"bridge failure"}],["$","span",null,{"className":"text-xs font-sans","children":" ↗"}]]," and a problem with most marine structures supported by the seabed in areas of significant ",[["$","a",null,{"href":"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tidal_scour","target":"_blank","rel":"noreferrer noopener","children":"tidal"}],["$","span",null,{"className":"text-xs font-sans","children":" ↗"}]]," and ocean current."]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":["It has been estimated that 60% of all bridge failures result from scour and other hydraulic-related causes.",["$","br",null,{}],"\n",["$","small",null,{"className":"_subtle block my-1 text-sm text-left italic text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-100","children":["Source: ",[["$","a",null,{"href":"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bridge_scour","target":"_blank","rel":"noreferrer noopener","children":"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bridge_scour"}],["$","span",null,{"className":"text-xs font-sans","children":" ↗"}]]]}]]}],"\n"]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":["According to ",["$","a",null,{"href":"#gates-opening-in-2018","children":"these posts by UkrHydroElectro"}]," from 2018 — one gate roughly drains 100 cubic meters of water per second. Let’s take that at least since 02 January 2023 three gates are fully opened and two are half-opened. And let’s ignore overdrainage and overtopping for simplicity, we’ll say that they cancel each other out. That means we have roughly 400 cubic meters of water drained each second. Giving us roughly 5_356_800_000 cubic meters drained, if only counting the last 5 months before the breach. And we’re even not counting the opened gates on the HPP."]}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"id":"does-it-mean-that-the-dam-broke-on-its-own","children":["$","a",null,{"href":"#does-it-mean-that-the-dam-broke-on-its-own","className":"no-underline","children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"float-left text-gray-300 dark:text-gray-700","style":{"marginLeft":"-2ch"},"children":" #"}],"Does it mean that the dam broke on its own?"]}]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":"No. If someone leaves a stove on for long, and the house catches fire — we don’t say “the house burned down on its own”. It is an arson."}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":["Albeit being monumental and robust, dams require professional maintenance and precise manipulation. And they can fail for a variety of reasons: ",[["$","a",null,{"href":"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dam_failure","target":"_blank","rel":"noreferrer noopener","children":"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dam_failure"}],["$","span",null,{"className":"text-xs font-sans","children":" ↗"}]],", including poor maintenance."]}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"id":"what-about-the-evidence-of-an-explosion","children":["$","a",null,{"href":"#what-about-the-evidence-of-an-explosion","className":"no-underline","children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"float-left text-gray-300 dark:text-gray-700","style":{"marginLeft":"-2ch"},"children":" #"}],"What about the evidence of an explosion?"]}]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":["Well, currently evidence of an explosion is unverifiable and contradictory. It doesn’t mean that there were no explosions. It only means that our evidence for the explosion demolition version is not enough. See this section for more: ",["$","a",null,{"href":"#explosion-theory-evidence-and-critics","children":"Explosion theory evidence and critics"}]]}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"id":"so-russia-did-it-by-explosives-or-by-ill-maintenance-does-it-really-matter-which-way","children":["$","a",null,{"href":"#so-russia-did-it-by-explosives-or-by-ill-maintenance-does-it-really-matter-which-way","className":"no-underline","children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"float-left text-gray-300 dark:text-gray-700","style":{"marginLeft":"-2ch"},"children":" #"}],"So russia did it by explosives or by ill-maintenance, does it really matter which way?"]}]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":"It doesn’t matter for russia — they are guilty either way and should face the consequences. But for the world it is important to learn how exactly the breach happened, and how we can prevent similar disasters in the future."}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":"If some terrorists want to blow up a hazardous infrastructure that they captured — there’s little we can do to prevent that. We had to act before, not letting terrorists into the place. But if this disaster happened by knowing or unknowing mis-maintenance — then the world could foresee this catastrophe and intervene with social, political, economic and raw force months before the breach. Actually, the OSINT community has been warning the world about possible catastrophe, but our existing international institutions could not or would not prevent the disaster."}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":"If this evidence of scouring / washout indeed was sufficient to cause the dam breach — then russia should’ve noticed the breaking structures at least 38 days before the breach. Thus before we prove explosion or erosion, we already have a case of criminal inaction."}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":["May I also remind you: aside from many suffering cities and villages, russia also currently occupies the  ",[["$","a",null,{"href":"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zaporizhzhia_Nuclear_Power_Plant","target":"_blank","rel":"noreferrer noopener","children":"Zaporizhzhia Nuclear Power Plant"}],["$","span",null,{"className":"text-xs font-sans","children":" ↗"}]],"."]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":"Read further to learn more about the dam, see a detailed timeline of the events, and explore why the explosion version doesn’t have enough evidence."}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"id":"photos","children":["$","a",null,{"href":"#photos","className":"no-underline","children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"float-left text-gray-300 Водночас росіяни підняли затвори на ГЕС і скидають там воду.",["$","br",null,{}],"\n",["$","small",null,{"className":"_subtle block my-1 text-sm text-left italic text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-100","children":["Source: ",[["$","a",null,{"href":"https://investigator.org.ua/ua/news-2/254079/","target":"_blank","rel":"noreferrer noopener","children":"https://investigator.org.ua/ua/news-2/254079/"}],["$","span",null,{"className":"text-xs font-sans","children":" ↗"}]]]}]]}],"\n"]}],"\n",["$","blockquote",null,{"children":["\n",["$","p",null,{"children":["Наші співробітники, ризикуючи своїм життям, виконували професійні обов’язки. Гідно пройшли водопілля навесні 2022 року, працювали на станції та підтримували обладнання в належному стані. З жовтня окупанти перестали допускати українських працівників до управління гідроелектростанцією та на її територію.",["$","br",null,{}],"\n",["$","small",null,{"className":"_subtle block my-1 text-sm text-left italic text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-100","children":["Source: ",[["$","a",null,{"href":"https://uhe.gov.ua/media_tsentr/novyny/nova-kakhovka-ce-ukraina","target":"_blank","rel":"noreferrer 2023"]}]}],"\n",["$","h4",null,{"id":"01-january-2023","children":["$","a",null,{"href":"#01-january-2023","className":"no-underline","children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"float-left 2023"]}]}],"\n",["$","figure",null,{"children":[["$","img",null,{"src":"assets/image39-40dd7256.jpg"}],["$","figcaption",null,{"children":["$","small",null,{"className":"_subtle block my-1 text-sm It spans far behind the riverbed protective layer. But it’s unclear how deep that turbulent water layer can be."}],"\n",["$","li",null,{"children":"For gates state see 02 January 2023 notes."}],"\n"]}],"\n",["$","h4",null,{"id":"02-january-2023","children":["$","a",null,{"href":"#02-january-2023","className":"no-underline","children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"float-left algae trace. And on September 6, 2022 — 4 out of 6 turbines were working: ",["$","a",null,{"href":"#06-september-2022-4-out-of-6-hpp-turbines-are-working","children":"06 September 2022"}],". Also note that on ",["$","a",null,{"href":"#11-march-2023","children":"11 March 2023"}]," the HPP crane-top is destroyed."]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":"Note:"}],"\n",["$","ul",null,{"children":["\n",["$","li",null,{"children":["It is unclear how strong is the flow of water through the turbines, but on this video we hear some strong background noise inside the HPP: ",["$","a",null,{"href":"#25-march-2023","children":"25 March 2023 — inside HPP"}],", which might indicate flowing water."]}],"\n",["$","li",null,{"children":"It is unclear if HPP river-bottom gates are opened or not (that surpasses turbines)"}],"\n"]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":"My speculations:"}],"\n",["$","ul",null,{"children":["\n",["$","li",null,{"children":"it is possible that without fixing the crane — the HPP intake could not be adjusted."}],"\n",["$","li",null,{"children":"constant water flow through HPP gates near the separator wall could catalyze the riverbed scouring."}],"\n"]}],"\n",["$","h5",null,{"id":"feb-jun-extreme-drainage-and-overtopping","children":["$","a",null,{"href":"#feb-jun-extreme-drainage-and-overtopping","className":"no-underline","children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"float-left charts above — at least since January 2033 the HPP and the sluice gates were not operated."}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":"This lead first to over-drainage and then to overtopping of Kakhovka Reservoir during December 2022 - June 2023 period."}],"\n",["$","h5",null,{"id":"kakhovka-reservoir-water-levels-2016-2023","children":["$","a",null,{"href":"#kakhovka-reservoir-water-levels-2016-2023","className":"no-underline","children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"float-left (2016-2023)"]}]}],"\n",["$","figure",null,{"children":[["$","img",null,{"src":"assets/image119-41f287c7.png"}],["$","figcaption",null,{"children":["$","small",null,{"className":"_subtle block my-1 ",[["$","a",null,{"href":"https://hydroweb.theia-land.fr/hydroweb/view/L_kakhovka?lang=en&basin=Dniepr&lake=kakhovka","target":"_blank","rel":"noreferrer font-sans","children":" ↗"}]]]}]}]}]]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":"~"}],"\n",["$","blockquote",null,{"children":["\n",["$","p",null,{"children":[[["$","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/davidhelms570","target":"_blank","rel":"noreferrer noopener","children":"David Helms"}],["$","span",null,{"className":"text-xs font-sans","children":" ↗"}]]," ",[["$","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/davidhelms570","target":"_blank","rel":"noreferrer noopener","children":"@davidhelms570"}],["$","span",null,{"className":"text-xs font-sans","children":" ↗"}]]]}],"\n",["$","img",null,{"src":"assets/image3-b626084e.gif"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":["1. Ruschist operation of Kakhovka HPP (K-HPP) dam has been reckless. Kakhovka Reservoir (KR) water level has alternated from record low to record high in just 3 months. Loop (6 FEB-6 MAY 2023) shows sand bars receding with rising KR water. through gates upstream for at least 166 days (since ",["$","a",null,{"href":"#13-november-2022","children":"13 November 2022"}],")"]}],"\n",["$","li",null,{"children":"This break likely indicates that the foundation of the wall is damaged. And further scouring of the riverbed is expected."}],"\n",["$","li",null,{"children":"Gate #3 is raised on the crane hooks & there’s visible water intake"}],"\n",["$","li",null,{"children":"Gate #5, #6, #7 are opened"}],"\n",["$","li",null,{"children":"Gate #12 is raised, no visible water flowing through."}],"\n"]}],"\n",["$","img",null,{"src":"assets/image97-2f8c6103.png"}],"\n",["$","ol",null,{"start":"6","children":["\n",["$","li",null,{"children":["This is the first time we see the white car with the explosives. AP will write ",["$","a",null,{"href":"#car-with-explosives-on-the-dam","children":"an article"}]," about it."]}],"\n"]}],"\n",["$","img",null,{"src":"assets/image30-ddaf776d.jpg"}],"\n",["$","h5",null,{"id":"my-speculations-on-how-it-happened-and-what-this-means","children":["$","a",null,{"href":"#my-speculations-on-how-it-happened-and-what-this-means","className":"no-underline","children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"float-left text-gray-300 dark:text-gray-700","style":{"marginLeft":"-2ch"},"children":" #"}],"My speculations on how it happened and what this means"]}]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":"From the tip of the wall till the sluice gates there’s about 100 - 120 meters:"}],"\n",["$","img",null,{"src":"assets/image124-231af5a0.jpg"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":"Thus we can deduce foundation under that piece that broke off:"}],"\n",["$","img",null,{"src":"assets/image106-618c061e.jpg"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":["Looks like that tip that broke off was standing on or near the ",[["$","a",null,{"href":"https://uk.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%A0%D0%B8%D1%81%D0%B1%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%BC%D0%B0","target":"_blank","rel":"noreferrer noopener","children":"rysberma"}],["$","span",null,{"className":"text-xs font-sans","children":" ↗"}]]," or riprap (#5 above). Riprap is a layer of rocks and concrete, that lies right after the 4m thick concrete apron (#4). Riprap protects riverbottom from scouring, breaks and slows down the stream to normalize it with the rest of the water. It is claimed that during Kakhovka dam construction water levels could not be managed properly during floods. Because of that water drainage happened in extreme conditions, which lead to riverbed scouring just downstream from rysberma. ",["$","a",null,{"href":"#k-dam-river-bed-was-already-scoured-washed-out-once-in-1950-s","children":"K-Dam river bed was already scoured once"}]]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":"After that wall tip broke off we can say that the riprap was damaged and the riverbed was prone to further scouring."}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":["Further water drainage through gates #1, #3, #5-7 and probably HPP gates would further erode the foundation of the wall, leading to the foundations of the s-bridge that would fall on статті:"}],"\n",["$","h4",null,{"id":"в-статті-не-береться-до-уваги-що-є-всі-ознаки-прогресуючої-ерозії-основи-греблі","children":["$","a",null,{"href":"#в-статті-не-береться-до-уваги-що-є-всі-ознаки-прогресуючої-ерозії-основи-греблі","className":"no-underline","children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"float-left text-gray-300 dark:text-gray-700","style":{"marginLeft":"-2ch"},"children":" #"}],"В статті не береться до уваги що є всі ознаки прогресуючої ерозії основи греблі"]}]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":"Експерти NYT кажуть що:"}],"\n",["$","blockquote",null,{"children":["\n",["$","p",null,{"children":"Neither this previous damage, nor the pressure caused by the high water level or the static position of the cranes is likely to have caused the collapse of the dam’s concrete foundation, experts said, unless the concrete was of low quality and already prone to deteriorate. The large flows would also be insufficient to undermine the dam’s foundation unless, for some reason, the concrete apron — the downstream cover placed over the river bottom — contained flaws or the soil was much softer than accounted for in the design."}],"\n"]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":"Але ознаки ерозії рисберми та водобою в статті NYT не розглядають."}],"\n",["$","h4",null,{"id":"затоплення-частини-водозливної-греблі","children":["$","a",null,{"href":"#затоплення-частини-водозливної-греблі","className":"no-underline","children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"float-left text-gray-300 dark:text-gray-700","style":{"marginLeft":"-2ch"},"children":" #"}],"Затоплення частини водозливної греблі"]}]}],"\n",["$","figure",null,{"children":[["$","img",null,{"src":"assets/image129-ca1a9b93.jpg"}],["$","img",null,{"src":"assets/image57-cd1bea49.jpg"}],["$","figcaption",null,{"children":[["$","p",null,{"children":"Photos and illustrations from the article"}],["$","small",null,{"className":"_subtle block my-1 text-sm text-left italic text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-100","children":["Source of the video NYT article uses: ",[["$","a",null,{"href":"https://t.me/milinfolive/102188","target":"_blank","rel":"noreferrer noopener","children":"https://t.me/milinfolive/102188"}],["$","span",null,{"className":"text-xs font-sans","children":" ↗"}]]]}]]}]]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":"NYT вказує на те що оскільки не видно верхівки водозливної греблі — то це означає що її підірвали."}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":"Хоча з опублікованих ними ж кадрів видно що греблю викривило-зломало донизу (малюнок нижче). Не вниз за течією, а донизу. Нагадаю що гребля стоїть на піщаному дні, і їй нема куди вигинатися, якщо дно не підмито."}],"\n",["$","figure",null,{"children":[["$","img",null,{"src":"assets/image28-292ca36d.jpg"}],["$","figcaption",null,{"children":["$","p",null,{"children":"We can see a v-shaped break of the weir line"}]}]]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":"Якщо ми берем підрив за основну теорію прориву дамби — то спочатку міг бути підрив, потім підмив, потім падіння греблі. Якщо ми берем за основу теорію підмиву дамби — то греблю могло підмити, і тоді вона переломилась під власною вагою."}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":"Мій аргумент такий що цим зламом неможливо довести підрив. Водозливну греблю прогнуло донизу, це сталося після підмиву дна. Як стався підмив дна поки невідомо."}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":"Інший ракурс, щоб показати що це не вигин за течією, а вигін вниз до дна:"}],"\n",["$","figure",null,{"children":[["$","img",null,{"src":"assets/image112-4920e1cb.png"}],["$","img",null,{"src":"assets/image40-92eb5097.png"}],["$","figcaption",null,{"children":["$","small",null,{"className":"_subtle block my-1 text-sm text-left italic text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-100","children":["Photos source: ",[["$","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/cxemu/status/1669805342400602114","target":"_blank","rel":"noreferrer noopener","children":"https://twitter.com/cxemu/status/1669805342400602114"}],["$","span",null,{"className":"text-xs font-sans","children":" ↗"}]]]}]}]]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":"And we know that after the initial breach — there was some scouring under the constructions:"}],"\n",["$","blockquote",null,{"children":["\n",["$","p",null,{"children":["$","strong",null,{"children":[[["$","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/DraftnDepth","target":"_blank","rel":"noreferrer noopener","children":"Over/_\\Drive"}],["$","span",null,{"className":"text-xs font-sans","children":" ↗"}]]," ",[["$","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/DraftnDepth","target":"_blank","rel":"noreferrer noopener","children":"@DraftnDepth"}],["$","span",null,{"className":"text-xs font-sans","children":" ↗"}]]]}]}],"\n",["$","img",null,{"src":"assets/image139-bb1f4ff8.png"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":["Here is a screen shot showing that the whole turbine hall now is 4-5m below the road level (much better visible in the video) and even below the water level. The turbine hall sitting on a massive foundation is still more or less intact, but below it the sand was washed away. 7/x",["$","br",null,{}],"\n",["$","small",null,{"className":"_subtle block my-1 text-sm text-left italic text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-100","children":["Source: ",[["$","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/DraftnDepth/status/1666797145364787200","target":"_blank","rel":"noreferrer noopener","children":"https://twitter.com/DraftnDepth/status/1666797145364787200"}],["$","span",null,{"className":"text-xs font-sans","children":" ↗"}]]]}]]}],"\n"]}],"\n",["$","h4",null,{"id":"satellite-detecting-explosions-at-or-near-the-dam","children":["$","a",null,{"href":"#satellite-detecting-explosions-at-or-near-the-dam","className":"no-underline","children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"float-left text-gray-300 dark:text-gray-700","style":{"marginLeft":"-2ch"},"children":" #"}],"Satellite detecting explosions at or near the dam"]}]}],"\n",["$","blockquote",null,{"children":["\n",["$","p",null,{"children":"just before the dam gave way, American intelligence satellites captured infrared heat signals that also indicated an explosion."}],"\n"]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":"How precise is the measurement, where exactly it was detected, how strong was the explosion, when exactly did it happen? We have no hard data on this, just the claims of some U.S. officials."}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":"We also have this FIRMS fire detection (likewise, not sure about the accuracy) :"}],"\n",["$","figure",null,{"children":[["$","img",null,{"src":"assets/image125-69447039.png"}],["$","figcaption",null,{"children":["$","small",null,{"className":"_subtle block my-1 text-sm get data on the FIRMS accuracy"}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"id":"seismic-activity","children":["$","a",null,{"href":"#seismic-activity","className":"no-underline","children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"float-left activity"]}]}],"\n",["$","figure",null,{"children":[["$","img",null,{"src":"assets/image17-2573ee46.jpg"}],["$","figcaption",null,{"children":["$","small",null,{"className":"_subtle block my-1 text-sm ↗"}]]]}]}]]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":"Notes:"}],"\n",["$","ul",null,{"children":["\n",["$","li",null,{"children":"Local chats report “explosive” sounds at around 2:18 local time (not 02:35)"}],"\n",["$","li",null,{"children":"It is not clear if 21 meters high and 46 meters wide reinforced concrete barrage break and fall under the water could cause similar seismic signals. We also know that the HPP building failed separately, after the main breach in the barrage. Could that cause the first and the second “explosion” signal?"}],"\n",["$","li",null,{"children":"Location precision and force of the explosions detected by the seismic sensors are unknown and are not verified by other teams."}],"\n",["$","li",null,{"children":"Could the flowing mines or artillery duels cause similar signals?"}],"\n",["$","li",null,{"children":["It would be interesting to compare that signal strength to other explosions in the area, like:","\n",["$","ul",null,{"children":["\n",["$","li",null,{"children":["FAB on 1 June 2023: ",[["$","a",null,{"href":"https://suspilne.media/493903-rosijska-armia-z-aviacii-vdarila-po-berislavu-kozackomu-ta-novij-kahovci/","target":"_blank","rel":"noreferrer noopener","children":"Російська армія з авіації вдарила по Бериславу, Козацькому та Новій Каховці: що відомо"}],["$","span",null,{"className":"text-xs font-sans","children":" ↗"}]]]}],"\n",["$","li",null,{"children":["Or bigger ones like detonation of an ammo storage facility on 11 July 2022: ",[["$","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YMc2cUzEZaw","target":"_blank","rel":"noreferrer noopener","children":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YMc2cUzEZaw"}],["$","span",null,{"className":"text-xs font-sans","children":" ↗"}]]]}],"\n"]}],"\n"]}],"\n"]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":"TODO: потрібні консультації з експертами щоб показати могло чи не могло перелом-падіння греблі викликати сейсмічні коливання."}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"id":"car-with-explosives-on-the-dam","children":["$","a",null,{"href":"#car-with-explosives-on-the-dam","className":"no-underline","children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"float-left text-gray-300 dark:text-gray-700","style":{"marginLeft":"-2ch"},"children":" #"}],"Car with explosives on the dam"]}]}],"\n",["$","figure",null,{"children":[["$","img",null,{"src":"assets/image83-e13ecaf0.png"}],["$","figcaption",null,{}]]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":["19 June 2023: AP published ",[["$","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/AP/status/1670553785255485440","target":"_blank","rel":"noreferrer noopener","children":"an article"}],["$","span",null,{"className":"text-xs font-sans","children":" ↗"}]]," with drone footage of a car, loaded with explosives."]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":["The issue is that the car is standing there after the dam breach of June 2023. It stood there since at least ",["$","a",null,{"href":"#28-april-2023-part-of-the-wall-separating-hpp-dam-breaks","children":"28 April 2023"}],"."]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":"Though it is yet another proof that russsia thought that integrity of the dam is less important than stopping UA forces from crossing the dam."}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":"EDIT: AP has updated the article to confirm that the car still stands on the dam, and didn’t cause the breach."}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"id":"allegedly-intercepted-russian-transmission-near-the-dam-around-the-time-of-the-breach","children":["$","a",null,{"href":"#allegedly-intercepted-russian-transmission-near-the-dam-around-the-time-of-the-breach","className":"no-underline","children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"float-left text-gray-300 dark:text-gray-700","style":{"marginLeft":"-2ch"},"children":" #"}],"Allegedly intercepted russian transmission near the dam, around the time of the breach"]}]}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"children":"The source is claimed to be from ZSU.
